item.title: Shopping for an Affordable Care Act health plan? NPR wants to hear your experience
item.description: If you buy your own health insurance through the ACA marketplaces, how do this year's prices look to you?

item.title: Doctors find fresh evidence that fruits and veggies can act as powerful medicine

item.title: What's behind your phone cravings and how movement can replace them
item.description: Breaking your scrolling habit could help you feel calmer, happier, and more energized. NPR's Life Kit explains how to get there.
